scene_description_enriched: A man with a beard and a distinctive hat, dressed in a blue robe with gold trim and red leggings, rides a white horse. He is depicted in profile, looking forward. The horse is adorned with a red bridle and harness. The scene is set in a lush green landscape with scattered trees and a path. In the background, a river flows past a walled city with several towers and spires, including a prominent tall tower with a conical roof. Further in the distance, more buildings and a mountainous landscape are visible under a blue sky with scattered clouds.
